title: 349 - Creamweavers
description: Dan makes a sweater out of cum, and debates with Jeff the pros of being a stander wiper. Dave Foley joins in with tales from The Kids in the Hall and NewsRadio. Who wants a pocket shaman now? Featuring Dan Harmon, Jeff Bryan Davis, Spencer Crittenden and Dave Foley.
nextTitle: 350 - You Have Ten Seconds to Comply
